elements.name: Beurteilen Sie ausgehend von Gesetz 1 und 2 sowie den beiden Szenarien, ob folgende Aussagen richtig oder falsch sind.

rows.text: If your product is only sold by you (or a few others) and many people want to buy it, you can charge a high price.
rows.value: If your product is only sold by you (or a few others) and many people want to buy it, you can charge a high price.

rows.text: If you sell as many products as you want to buy in a given period, you will not raise or lower the price, but leave it unchanged.
rows.value: If you sell as many products as you want to buy in a given period, you will not raise or lower the price, but leave it unchanged.

rows.text: If your product is also sold by many others and few people want to buy it, you can only charge a very low price.
rows.value: If your product is also sold by many others and few people want to buy it, you can only charge a very low price.

elements.title: Based on Laws 1 and 2 and the two scenarios, assess whether the following statements are correct or incorrect.
